civil rights of citizens or also rights of other kinds. In Strauder v. West Virginia
(1880), a law that made blacks ineligible for jury duty was struck down on
the grounds that the equal protection clause prohibits discrimination in ar-
eas of civil rights. In Yick Wo v. Hopkins(1886), the Court applied the equal
protection clause to discrimination in areas of economic rights. Yick Woalso
